availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin D. Hogan (Carroll County and Owen County, Kentucky, clerk.)

body.p: Carroll County and Owen County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of John Hogan and Elizabeth Hogan. Clerk in Carroll County, Kentucky in 1860. Signed a petition on behalf of George W. Suter as Deputy Clerk of Owen County Circuit Court on November 14, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 1, p. 190A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton, p. 26.
